org.ros.node.service
Interface ServiceClient<RequestType,ResponseType>

Type Parameters:
RequestType - the ServiceServer responds to requests of this type
ResponseType - the ServiceServer returns responses of this type
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultServiceClient
public interface ServiceClient<RequestType,ResponseType>

Provides a connection to a ROS service.

Author:
damonkohler@google.com (Damon Kohler)

void shutdown()
Stops the client (e.g. disconnect a persistent service connection).
